QUESTION: 1. Can a fraudster withdraw money from my Aadhaar linked bank account if he knows my Aadhaar number or has my Aadhaar card?
ANSWERS: Just by knowing your Aadhaar number or Aadhaar linked bank account, no one can withdraw money from Aadhaar linked bank account.

QUESTION: 2. Why shouldn't I put my Aadhaar number on social media?
ANSWERS: Because it’s sensitive—UIDAI says you should avoid posting it publicly to keep your data secure.

QUESTION: How long does it take to get my Aadhaar letter after enrollment?
ANSWERS: It can take up to 90 days, delivered by post.

QUESTION: What if I don’t receive my Aadhaar letter?
ANSWERS: You can check online or contact UIDAI with your Enrolment ID; you can also download e-Aadhaar.

QUESTION: How do I retrieve my Aadhaar number if I’ve lost it?
ANSWERS: Use “Retrieve Lost UID/EID” on UIDAI site or call 1947.

QUESTION: How do I lock or unlock my Aadhaar number?
ANSWERS: You can lock/unlock via UIDAI website, mAadhaar app, or SMS to 1947 using VID.

QUESTION: Can I use Aadhaar freely for identity and transactions?
ANSWERS: Yes, use it like any ID—just avoid sharing publicly.

QUESTION: What is an Aadhaar PVC card? Is it same as paper letter?
ANSWERS: Durable PVC version, equivalent to letter and easy to carry.

QUESTION: How to order Aadhaar PVC card?
ANSWERS: Order online with Aadhaar/EID, pay ₹50, delivered by speed post.

QUESTION: How long for PVC card delivery?
ANSWERS: Handover to India Post in 5 days, then delivered via Speed Post.

QUESTION: Can I update demo/biometric at any center?
ANSWERS: Yes, any center across India, not just original one.

QUESTION: Can foreign nationals update Aadhaar?
ANSWERS: Yes—Resident Foreign Nationals can, with valid documents.

QUESTION: How to update gender if previously updated once?
ANSWERS: One free update; additional requires documents and exception via center.

QUESTION: Can I download e-Aadhaar after update?
ANSWERS: Yes—you can download the updated Aadhaar as e-Aadhaar.

QUESTION: Update mobile number without old one?
ANSWERS: Yes—any Aadhaar center; no documents or old number needed.

QUESTION: How long for update requests?
ANSWERS: ~90% processed within 30 days.

QUESTION: What types of passports are issued in India?
ANSWERS: Ordinary (dark blue), Diplomatic (maroon), and Official (white) passports

QUESTION: What is the validity of passports?
ANSWERS: Adults get 10 years; minors get 5 years or until they turn 18; minors aged 15–18 may choose a full 10-year validity.

QUESTION: Can I apply online for a passport?
ANSWERS: Yes—fill the online form on Passport Seva portal, then visit PSK or POPSK for biometric submission

QUESTION: Do minors need a separate passport?
ANSWERS: Yes—endorsement in a parent’s passport is not allowed. Every minor needs their own passport.

QUESTION: Is consent required for a minor if a parent is abroad?
ANSWERS: Yes—Annexure D must be signed by both parents (or Annexure C if consent cannot be obtained).

QUESTION: Are there fee rebates?
ANSWERS: Minors under 8 get a 10% rebate on fresh passport fees; senior citizens (60+) also get a 10% discount and expedited service.

QUESTION: Can I apply at a Passport Seva Camp?
ANSWERS: Yes, only for Fresh or Re-issue (normal)—not for Tatkaal or PCC. You must book an appointment and submit the form online first.

QUESTION: Can I apply via a representative?
ANSWERS: No—every applicant must be physically present at PSK/POPSK for biometric data submission.

QUESTION: What is an e-Passport?
ANSWERS: It’s a passport with an embedded RFID chip containing your personal and biometric data, identifiable by a gold symbol on the cover

QUESTION: Do I need to replace my valid passport with an e-Passport?
ANSWERS: No—existing passports remain valid until expiry. You’ll receive an e-Passport only when your applying PSK supports it.

QUESTION: What are the benefits of e-Passports?
ANSWERS: They offer enhanced data integrity, forgery protection, and secure global authentication.

QUESTION: Where have e-Passports rolled out?
ANSWERS: Initial rollout across 13 cities, including Nagpur, Goa, Delhi, and Hyderabad; Passport Seva 2.0 is expanding coverage further.

QUESTION: How has police verification improved?
ANSWERS: With Passport Seva 2.0 and mPassport Police App, police verification now takes about 5–7 days in many areas.

QUESTION: What should I do if I lose my passport?
ANSWERS: Report immediately to the local police and Passport Office or Indian mission (if abroad), then apply for re-issue.

QUESTION: Can I change a normal application to Tatkaal later?
ANSWERS: Generally not—but you may visit the Passport Office with proof of urgency to request a switch.

QUESTION: When is police verification done under Tatkaal?
ANSWERS: It’s done after passport issuance under the Tatkaal scheme.

QUESTION: Agar kisi fraudster ke paas mera Aadhaar number ya Aadhaar card ho, toh kya woh mere Aadhaar linked bank account se paise nikal sakta hai?
ANSWERS: Sirf Aadhaar number ya Aadhaar linked bank account details jaane se koi paise withdraw nahi kar sakta.

QUESTION: Aadhaar number social media par share kyu nahi karna chahiye?
ANSWERS: Kyuki yeh sensitive hai—UIDAI kehta hai ki data secure rakhne ke liye Aadhaar number public post karna avoid karo.

QUESTION: Enrollment ke baad Aadhaar letter aane mein kitna time lagta hai?
ANSWERS: Post ke through aane me 90 din tak lag sakte hain.

QUESTION: Agar Aadhaar letter receive na ho toh kya karna chahiye?
ANSWERS: Aap online check kar sakte ho ya Enrolment ID ke saath UIDAI se contact kar sakte ho; e-Aadhaar bhi download kar sakte ho.

QUESTION: Agar mera Aadhaar letter kho jaye toh usse wapas kaise nikalu?
ANSWERS: UIDAI site par “Retrieve Lost UID/EID” option use karo ya 1947 par call karo.

QUESTION: Aadhaar number ko lock ya unlock kaise karein?
ANSWERS: UIDAI website, mAadhaar app, ya SMS (1947 using VID) se lock/unlock kar sakte ho.

QUESTION: Kya Aadhaar ko identity aur transactions ke liye use kar sakte hain?
ANSWERS: Haan, kisi bhi ID ki tarah use kar sakte ho—bas publicly share karne se bacho.

QUESTION: Aadhaar PVC card kya hota hai? Kya yeh paper letter jaisa hi hai?
ANSWERS: PVC card ek durable version hai, paper letter jaisa hi hai aur carry karne me easy hai.

QUESTION: Aadhaar PVC card order kaise karein?
ANSWERS: Online order karo Aadhaar/EID se, ₹50 pay karo, aur Speed Post se deliver hoga.

QUESTION: PVC card delivery mein kitna time lagta hai?
ANSWERS: 5 din me India Post ko handover hota hai, phir Speed Post se deliver ho jata hai.

QUESTION: Kya demo/biometric update kisi bhi center par ho sakta hai?
ANSWERS: Haan, India ke kisi bhi center par update kar sakte ho, sirf original wale par hi nahi.

QUESTION: Kya foreign nationals bhi Aadhaar update kar sakte hain?
ANSWERS: Haan—Resident Foreign Nationals valid documents ke saath update kar sakte hain.

QUESTION: Agar gender pehle update ho gaya ho toh dobara kaise update karein?
ANSWERS: Ek free update milta hai; extra update ke liye documents aur center approval chahiye.

QUESTION: Update ke baad e-Aadhaar download kar sakte hain kya?
ANSWERS: Haan—update ke baad aap e-Aadhaar download kar sakte ho.

QUESTION: Kya mobile number purana number ke bina bhi update ho sakta hai?
ANSWERS: Haan—kisi bhi Aadhaar center par; documents ya purana number ki zarurat nahi hoti.

QUESTION: Update request process hone mein kitna time lagta hai?
ANSWERS: Lagbhag 90% requests 30 din ke andar process ho jaati hain.

QUESTION: India mein kaun-kaunse type ke passports milte hain?
ANSWERS: Ordinary (dark blue), Diplomatic (maroon), aur Official (white) passports hote hain.

QUESTION: Passport ki validity kitni hoti hai?
ANSWERS: Adults ke liye 10 years; minors ke liye 5 years ya jab tak 18 saal ke na ho; 15–18 ke minors 10-year validity choose kar sakte hain.

QUESTION: Passport ke liye online apply kar sakte hain kya?
ANSWERS: Haan—online form Passport Seva portal par fill karo, phir PSK/POPSK visit karke biometric submit karo.

QUESTION: Kya minors (bachche) ko alag passport lena padta hai?
ANSWERS: Haan—parent ke passport me endorsement allow nahi hai. Har minor ko apna passport lena padta hai.

QUESTION: Agar parent abroad hai toh minor ke liye consent zaruri hai kya?
ANSWERS: Haan—Annexure D dono parents ko sign karna hota hai (agar consent na ho toh Annexure C).

QUESTION: Kya passport ke liye fee rebates available hain?
ANSWERS: 8 saal se chhote minors ko fresh passport fees me 10% rebate milta hai; senior citizens (60+) ko bhi 10% discount aur fast service milti hai.

QUESTION: Kya Passport Seva Camp mein apply kar sakte hain?
ANSWERS: Haan, lekin sirf Fresh ya Re-issue (normal) ke liye—not for Tatkaal ya PCC. Appointment book karke form online submit karna padta hai.

QUESTION: Kya main representative ke through apply kar sakta hoon?
ANSWERS: Nahi—har applicant ko PSK/POPSK me physical present hona padta hai biometric ke liye.

QUESTION: e-Passport kya hota hai?
ANSWERS: Yeh ek passport hai jisme RFID chip hoti hai, jo personal aur biometric data store karti hai; cover par gold symbol hota hai.

QUESTION: Kya mujhe apna valid passport e-Passport se replace karna zaruri hai?
ANSWERS: Nahi—jo purane passports hain wo expiry tak valid rahenge. e-Passport tab milega jab aap jis PSK me apply kar rahe ho wo support karega.

QUESTION: e-Passports ke kya benefits hain?
ANSWERS: e-Passports data integrity, forgery protection aur secure global authentication dete hain.

QUESTION: e-Passports kaha par rollout huye hain?
ANSWERS: Pehle 13 cities me rollout hua tha (Nagpur, Goa, Delhi, Hyderabad, etc.); Passport Seva 2.0 ke saath aur jagah expand ho raha hai.

QUESTION: Police verification kaise improve hua hai?
ANSWERS: Passport Seva 2.0 aur mPassport Police App ke saath ab police verification 5–7 din me ho jata hai kai jagahon par.

QUESTION: Agar mera passport kho jaye toh mujhe kya karna chahiye?
ANSWERS: Agar passport kho jaye toh turant local police aur Passport Office (ya abroad ho toh Indian mission) ko report karo, fir re-issue ke liye apply karo.

QUESTION: Kya main normal application ko baad me Tatkaal me change kar sakta hoon?
ANSWERS: Generally nahi—but aap Passport Office me urgency proof ke saath jaake request kar sakte ho.

QUESTION: Tatkaal ke under police verification kab hota hai?
ANSWERS: Tatkaal scheme me passport issue hone ke baad police verification hota hai.
